Cherrycake\Image::isFileExists

isFileExists

Checks if a file for this Image exists or not. Checks for both Hd and non-Hd version of the image, if Hd is configured for the given $sizeName.

    Signature

    public function isFileExists([boolean $sizeName = false] )

    Parameters

    $sizeName — boolean
    Optional, if this Image has sizes, the size name file to check

    Returns

    boolean
    Whether the image file exists or not. If a $size is passed and this Image has sizes, the file checked is the one corresponding to that size
